comment: @jfinn6511 Hate to burst your bubble but my husband was on dialysis for a year and a half because of Truvada. He almost died. I blame his doctor for not recognizing the signs early enough but it does and can happen. Nevertheless, Truvada is a lifesaving drug for MOST people.
